In this world, everyone gets humiliated in a never-ending competition to humiliate others. Some are better than others. This story only follows the worst of the worst - the women who rarely get to humiliate anyone else, and get humiliated the most.

While all forms of humiliation are allowed (and encouraged!), this interactive will focus mainly on "schoolyard" forms of humiliation: wedgies, pantsings, swirlies, etc.

They can be used to humiliate other characters (such as pantsing an older sister), but should not even be a focus of chapters themselves. Failure to comply with these rules will result in chapter removal. I may send the authors of removed chapters a message telling them which rules they broke. Authors can resubmit chapters assuming they fix the points I ask them to, at which point I will be happy to let them stay up.

The most important thing is to be creative and have fun! Any additions are welcome, as are any questions or requests for me to make changes or additions to the interactive!
